医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
膳食纤维摄入重塑色氨酸代谢，促进肠道健康并降低疾病风险《自然微生物学》最近的一项研究表明，增加膳食纤维摄入量可以引导微生物色氨酸代谢，从而带来健康益处，例如改善肠道粘膜完整性并降低代谢紊乱的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Dietary-fibre-intake-reshapes-tryptophan-metabolism-promoting-gut-health-and-reducing-disease-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Dietary-fibre-intake-reshapes-tryptophan-metabolism-promoting-gut-health-and-reducing-disease-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94bbe2a4-c165-49d5-b49b-249250d73a65 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 21:00:00 -0400 Dietary fiber intake reshapes tryptophan metabolism, promoting gut health and reducing disease risks
Rice 和 MD Anderson 合作利用工程专业知识提供癌症解决方案该计划由莱斯大学的鲍刚和 MD 安德森大学的 Jeffrey Molldrem 博士领导，旨在促进两个机构在基础和转化癌症研究方面的合作，开发癌症检测和治疗的新技术，并确保外部资金支持进一步的研究和治疗。训练。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Rice-and-MD-Anderson-collaborative-harnesses-engineering-expertise-for-cancer-solutions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Rice-and-MD-Anderson-collaborative-harnesses-engineering-expertise-for-cancer-solutions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e23284de-c96c-4039-b795-59443c54cad2 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 14:12:33 -0400 Rice and MD Anderson collaborative harnesses engineering expertise for cancer solutions
了解疫苗接种在缓解长期新冠脑雾中的作用自 COVID-19 大流行爆发以来，10% 至 30% 的普通人群经历过某种形式的病毒引起的认知障碍，包括注意力不集中、脑雾或记忆丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Understanding-the-role-of-vaccination-in-mitigating-long-COVID-brain-fog.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Understanding-the-role-of-vaccination-in-mitigating-long-COVID-brain-fog.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c041ebc1-1bed-4f99-a521-89cf5945e4a1 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 14:08:15 -0400 Understanding the role of vaccination in mitigating long COVID brain fog
研究揭示产前接触环氧乙烷对胎儿发育的不利影响由“la Caixa”基金会支持的巴塞罗那全球健康研究所 (ISGlobal) 领导的一项研究提供了关于产前接触环氧乙烷 (EO) 对胎儿发育产生不利影响的新证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Study-reveals-the-adverse-effects-of-prenatal-exposure-to-violet-on-fetal-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Study-reveals-the-adverse-effects-of-prenatal-exposure-to-violet-on-fetal-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f35fbe1e-ab56-4860-8e2b-b4bd73cbced6 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 13:59:33 -0400 Study reveals the adverse effects of prenatal exposure to ethylene oxide on fetal development
增加邻里机会可能是促进婴儿发育的一种有前途的方法波士顿医学中心 (BMC) 的最新研究表明，在教育和社会经济机会更多的社区长大会对婴儿的大脑活动产生积极影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Enhancing-neighborhood-opportunities-can-be-a-promising-approach-to-promote-infant-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Enhancing-neighborhood-opportunities-can-be-a-promising-approach-to-promote-infant-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=263ccfa2-e04f-4056-956f-7dacb705d0b6 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 13:52:11 -0400 Enhancing neighborhood opportunities can be a promising approach to promote infant development
小学生更容易遭受非运动和娱乐相关的脑震荡费城儿童医院 (CHOP) 的研究人员发现，5 岁至 12 岁的幼儿更有可能因娱乐和其他非体育活动而遭受脑震荡，但与体育活动相比，这些伤害直到几天后才被专家发现。同一年龄段的相关脑震荡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Elementary-age-children-more-likely-to-experience-non-sports-and-recreation-lated-concussions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Elementary-age-children-more-likely-to-experience-non-sports-and-recreation-lated-concussions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=911d287a-626a-486b-bdbd-132ae6e00202 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 13:39:06 -0400 Elementary age children more likely to experience non-sports and recreation-related concussions
暴露在城市绿色和蓝色空间可能会降低冠状动脉钙化的几率靠近并更多地接触城市绿色空间和蓝色（水）空间与中年冠状动脉钙化的几率较低有关，而冠状动脉钙化是心血管疾病的早期标志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Exposure-to-urban-green-and-blue-spaces-may-lower-odds-of-having-coronary-artery-calcification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Exposure-to-urban-green-and-blue-spaces-may-lower-odds-of-having-coronary-artery-calcification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8ef1825-b461-4b1b-ae1f-d4e57cfa8e03 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 13:31:00 -0400 Exposure to urban green and blue spaces may lower odds of having coronary artery calcification
BII & Science 转化医学奖旨在表彰女性健康方面的突破美国科学促进会 (AAAS) 与生物创新研究所 (BII) 合作，宣布设立 BII 与科学转化医学女性健康创新奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/The-BII-Science-Translational-Medicine-Prize-launched-for-recognizing-breakthroughs-in-womens-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/The-BII-Science-Translational-Medicine-Prize-launched-for-recognizing-breakthroughs-in-womens-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bffa7522-14ea-4ec6-82e5-09a4e446a989 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 13:16:10 -0400 The BII & Science Translational Medicine Prize launched for recognizing breakthroughs in women's health
靶向基因治疗可减轻 AML 负担并保护心脏免受心脏毒性密苏里大学医学院的研究人员发现，靶向基因疗法可能会使急性髓系白血病 (AML) 对化疗更加敏感，同时还能保护心脏免受癌症治疗通常引起的毒性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Targeted-gene-therapy-may-reduce-AML-burden-and-protect-the-heart-from-cardiooxity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Targeted-gene-therapy-may-reduce-AML-burden-and-protect-the-heart-from-cardiooxity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02631f6e-4120-4b23-9d1c-c7214209b47a Thu, 27 Jun 2024 13:12:01 -0400 Targeted gene therapy may reduce AML burden and protect the heart from cardiotoxicity
精确调强放疗治疗晚期肺癌的效果优于 3D-CRT德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究结果支持对不可切除的局部晚期患者标准使用更精确的调强放射治疗 (IMRT)，而不是替代的 3D 适形放射治疗 (3D-CRT)非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Precise-intensity-modulated-radiotherapy-outperforms-3D-CRT-in-advanced-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Precise-intensity-modulated-radiotherapy-outperforms-3D-CRT-in-advanced-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e9f30f6-4cb8-43b3-9725-cea0eedfe890 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 12:59:00 -0400 Precise intensity-modulated radiotherapy outperforms 3D-CRT in advanced lung cancer
